alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:13PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Madison and central Gallatin Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 312 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 22 miles south of Virginia City to 22 miles southeast of Ennis to 6 miles west of Crescent Lake. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ennis, Jeffers, Big Sky and Cameron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
